EDWIN COOPERSTEIN
DIRECTOR OF TELEVISION
AND RADIO
GENEVA 8-1600
ry 8, 1968
Hr. Robert Underwood

IfAEB ' 'â– 
14 Gregory Hall j
Urbana, Illinois ^
Dear Mr. Underwood:
Many raontbe ago I submitted to you the necessary forms and
two tape recordings of a series entitled SGIKNO'^i aKD SOCIETY
for consideration by the NAEB for its Tape Network.
Not having heard anything about it in sometime, I am prompted
to write this brief note to inquire about the disposition of the
tapes and the forms. I am hopeful that SCIENCE AIUv SOCIETY
night still be considered for the Network, and that I might be
informed whether any action has been taken on it by your office.
V/ith thanks for your consideration, I remain.
Yoiars truly.
Edwin Cooperstein
